title: Jagged Spear
content:
Jagged Spear Uncommon 1~8 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6) Piercing Torturous Edges: Tortured creatures may receive Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The point of this spear is blackened and melted - the uneven metal is designed to catch deep in the wounds it creates. Spear Thrown Versatile 1.35 65

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6) Piercing

Torturous Edges: Tortured creatures may receive Disadvantage on Con
